channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.K. sends troops and tech to Belgium after drones force airport closures
item.description: Britain and Belgium aren't blaming anyone for the mystery drones, but they're the latest in a series of airspace violations one NATO ally calls Russia...

item.title: Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa, once an al Qaeda leader, meeting Trump at White House
item.description: Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa is set to meet with President Trump at the White House after leading a surprise attack that toppled the Assad regime....

item.title: WATCH: Typhoon Fung-wong batters Philippines
item.description: The storm hit the Philippines, killing at least four people and displacing more than 1.4 million others.

item.title: More than 2,000 flights canceled on Sunday as Duffy warns of further reduction
item.description: The FAA ordered airlines to cut thousands of flights ahead of this weekend as the agency deals with air traffic controller shortages during the govern...

item.title: Which members of the Senate are taking paychecks during the shutdown?
item.description: Some senators are donating their salaries in solidarity with federal workers.

item.title: Super Typhoon Fung-wong batters the Philippines
item.description: Super Typhoon Fung-wong slammed into the Philippines, bringing dangerous conditions to the country for the second time in a matter of days. CBS News' ...

item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's alleged prison perks spark Raskin probe into Trump administration
item.description: Rep. Jamie Raskin sent a sharply worded 6-page letter to President Donald Trump on Sunday.

item.title: Family mourns 18-year-old who died on Carnival cruise ship
item.description: The family of 18-year-old Anna Kepner, who was reported dead while aboard the Carnival Horizon cruise ship on Saturday, speaks out.

item.title: Air traffic controller sick calls surge amid shutdown, leading to flight cancellations, delays

item.title: WATCH: Trump becomes 1st president at a regular-season NFL game since 1978

item.title: US airlines’ daily cancellations exceed 2,700 as shutdown impact extends
item.description: U.S. airlines canceled more than 2,700 flights Sunday mostly because of the government shutdown and the Federal Aviation Administration’s order to red...

item.title: College students, stressed about federal food aid uncertainty, look to campuses for support
Trump administration demands states ‘undo’ full SNAP payouts as states warn of ‘catastrophic impact’
